BRUD.COM — Stolen Domain Overview

Status: Unrecovered
Original Owner: Arthur G. Porcher
Initial Registration: August 30, 1998
Theft Date: August 16, 2019
Registrar at Theft: GoDaddy
Current Registrar: GoDaddy (as of September 28, 2022)

Summary

The domain BRUD.COM was stolen in August 2019 through an unauthorized inter-registrar transfer from GoDaddy to Openprovider. Despite clear evidence of registrar failure and fraud, GoDaddy refused to reverse the transfer. By 2022, they had regained control of the domain but have not returned it to the rightful registrant.

This site presents a limited public record of verifiable documents and a summary of registrar negligence. Additional materials are reserved for legal counsel.
